name: Wedding
short_description: Elegant wedding celebration in a beautiful venue.
wed_desc1: Wedding planners offer comprehensive planning services to help couples with every aspect of their wedding, from selecting a venue and creating a budget to coordinating vendors and managing timelines.
wed_desc2: Venue Selection: Some services specialize in helping couples find the perfect wedding venue that matches their vision and budget.
wed_desc3: Photography and Videography: Wedding photographers and videographers capture the special moments of the day, creating lasting memories for couples to cherish.
ques2: What Factors Impact Wedding Planner Fees?
ans2: As we mentioned above, the average price of a planner might hover around $2,000, but many factors impact how much a wedding planner costsâ€”and there is a lot of variation. The factors that can impact the price of a wedding planner are the location of the wedding (transportation and lodging of the team, per-diems, etc.) and the scope of work for the wedding, explains Daniels. A lot of these are unknown until you actually get into the details of planning. Experience and expertise are also big factors but 20 to 25 percent of the budget is a good place to start, she says of determining a planner fee.
